bulbasaur.name: Bulbasaur
bulbasaur.description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

charmander.name: Charmander
charmander.description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

squirtle.name: Squirtle
squirtle.description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

pikachu.name: Pikachu
pikachu.description: When several of these Pokémon gather, their electricity can build and cause lightning storms.
